task.title: Insert a new slide in a PowerPoint presentation
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn how to insert a new slide in PowerPoint presentation.

taskbody.prereq:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Steps:

step.cmd: Select New Slide and select the desired Slide Layout.

result.p: You have inserted a new slide in the PowerPoint presentation.
